Hello World.

We are very excited to **Officially** announce our new VPS location for Zappie Host.

**New Delhi, India**

As always, the VPS servers are in a low-end price range and native IPv6 is available.

Please go here for our looking glass and test IP addresses: [http://lg-in.zappiehost.com/](http://lg-in.zappiehost.com/)

To celebrate this new location opening officially we wanted to do a little give away competition, so here goes: 

How many jelly beans are in this server?

![](http://i.imgur.com/vyYKb8e.jpg)

**Prizes:**

 - **1st place** - The first closest 1 person will get a 100% recurring discount on any of our VPS servers (for life)
 - **2nd place** - The next closest 3 people will get a 4GB VPS in a location of their choice free for 6 months.
 - **3rd place** - The next closest 3 people will get a 2GB VPS in a location of their choice free for 3 months
 - **4th place** - The next closest 3 people will get sent our shirts (in their size) for free ([shirt example]
(http://i.imgur.com/NrbHrNw.png))

_Essentially there will be 10 winners :D_

**Extra Notes and rules:**

- Any LET member that has been registered before this post date can compete.
- Place your guess publicly on this thread, only 1 guess per person.
- If, for some reason, you win and you dont want the prize, you can agree with whoever else to claim it on your behalf
- Our terms of services still apply when using the VPS machines.
- Services won are not refundable or exchangeable for money or credit
- Competition closes at 5th April UTC (thats 2 days and ~3hours from this post)
- Countdown can be seen [here](http://www.tickcounter.com/countdown/1459814400000/utc/dhms/FFFFFF3B5998000000FF0000/)
- Jelly beans have been individually counted (yes I had instant regrets as soon as I started pouring them in the server

Good luck!!
